subject: Baseball
Cattle
lead_paragraph: Ross Ohlendorf hopes to stand out as the Yankees thin the crowded herd of relievers. He is also a rancher, raising some 250 longhorns near Austin, Tex.
snippet: Ross Ohlendorf hopes to stand out as the Yankees thin the crowded herd of relievers. He is also a rancher, raising some 250 longhorns near Austin, Tex.
